factory_girl

Easy-to-use DSL for declaring and using factories.

  • Fixture replacement with straightforward definition syntax
  • Provides support for multiple build strategies
  • Support for multiple factories for the same class
Read Documentation

Easy Installation:

 View on Github 
gem install factory_girl

-OR-

Add the following line to Gemfile:

gem 'factory_girl'

and run bundle install from your shell.
